sn36.15:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi, ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn36.15:1.2: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.15:1.3: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.15:1.5: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.15:1.9: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṁ—
sn36.15:1.11: Yaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ vedanāya assādo.
sn36.15:1.12: Yaṁ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn36.15:1.13: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ vedanāya nissaraṇaṁ.
sn36.15:1.14: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.15:1.15: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.16: saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
sn36.15:1.17: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.15:1.18: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.15:1.19: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.20: saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca vūpasantā honti.
sn36.15:1.21: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.15:1.22: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṁ paṭippassaddhi akkhātā.
sn36.15:1.23: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.28: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.15:1.29: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
